statements: SELECT * FROM supply_chain_data WHERE sensor_id = 12345;
SELECT id, location, value FROM supply_chain_data WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature';
SELECT timestamp, value FROM supply_chain_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, location FROM supply_chain_data WHERE value > 50;
SELECT id, sensor_type, value FROM supply_chain_data WHERE location LIKE '%warehouse%';
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_data WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, sensor_id, location FROM supply_chain_data WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(value) AS max_value FROM supply_chain_data GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_data WHERE location = 'Warehouse A' AND value < 50 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT sensor_type, AVG(value) AS avg_value FROM supply_chain_data GROUP BY sensor_type ORDER BY avg_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, humidity FROM SensorData WHERE humidity < 50
SELECT id, temperature FROM SensorData ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT product_name, quantity, location FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY product_name
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE location='Warehouse'
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(temperature), MAX(humidity) FROM SensorData GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING MAX(humidity) > 70;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse' AND quantity < 50 ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, last_updated FROM Inventory WHERE last_updated BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Inventory GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM SupplyChainInventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM SupplyChainInventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT item_name, location FROM SupplyChainInventory ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM IoTDevices WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT test_name FROM Test WHERE test_type = 'Unit Test' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM SupplyChainInventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM SupplyChainInventory ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT SC.item_name, SC.quantity, TD.device_name FROM SupplyChainInventory SC JOIN IoTDevices TD ON SC.location = TD.location WHERE SC.quantity > 10;

SELECT SE.event_id, SE.event_type, SE.event_timestamp, SC.item_name, TD.device_name FROM SupplyChainEvents SE JOIN SupplyChainInventory SC ON SE.item_id = SC.item_id JOIN IoTDevices TD ON SE.device_id = TD.device_id WHERE SE.event_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT T.test_name, T.test_type, COUNT(*) AS test_count FROM Test T GROUP BY T.test_name HAVING test_count > 1 ORDER BY test_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT name, location FROM Suppliers ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT id, order_date, quantity FROM Orders WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT sensor_type, location, value FROM Sensors WHERE data_type = 'temperature';
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE price >= 50 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT p.name, s.location FROM Products p INNER JOIN Suppliers s ON p.id = s.id WHERE s.location = 'New York';
SELECT p.name, o.order_date, o.quantity FROM Products p INNER JOIN Orders o ON p.id = o.product_id WHERE o.quantity > 10;
SELECT s.name, s.location, COUNT(o.id) AS order_count FROM Suppliers s LEFT JOIN Orders o ON s.id = o.supplier_id GROUP BY s.name, s.location;
SELECT AVG(value) AS average_value, MAX(value) AS max_value, MIN(value) AS min_value FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 50;
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM sensor_data ORDER BY sensor_value ASC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location = 'New York';
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT s.supplier_name, p.product_name, o.quantity FROM suppliers s JOIN orders o ON s.supplier_id = o.supplier_id JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id;
